summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2457 for the improvement of Twenty-fifth Avenue North, from Helen Street to East Galer Street, all in the City of Seattle, by laying watermains therein of property dimensions and materials, together with all necessary gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and all other appurtenances necessary for the proper water service and fire protection of said district; under Ordinance No. 26354, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
